title: Very Clean 3 Bedrooms-1st Floor Front-Immediate Occupancy-Pet OK-NICE
posting_body: 1ST FLOOR FRONT-3 BEDROOMS-PET FRIENDLY-CENTRAL HEAT-BASEMENT-EASY PARKING-STOVE & FRIDGE-NEW CARPET THROUGHOUT-NEW BLINDS, CEILING FANS, SMALL LIVING ROOM PICTURE WINDOW & MORE….
1st Floor Front In Prime Brighton/McKinley Park... 5 Rooms 3 Bedrooms
Lots of pictures of your new apartment and a live video tour at <URL>.
Please dial 773-373-7368 for all information that you need to rent it right on the spot if you are prepared.
This clean apartment is a 1st Floor apartment that has 3 bedrooms for the price of many one bedroom apartments in McKinley Park.
There is a step down bathroom and gas forced air central heat to keep you very warm in the wintertime.
The entire apartment is a total of approximately 1,000 square feet so with the unfinished basement there is 2,000 square feet of useable rental space.
You may park right outside the back door or on the public way frontage road in front of the building right next to all of the brand new expensive condos.
There is a big walk in closet in the master bedroom and nice size closets everywhere.
The apartment is freshly painted with top quality Benjamin Moore designer paint.
We provide a stove and fridge at no extra charge, or if you have your own appliances you are welcome to use yours…NP.

Cats are welcome and we may consider a dog if you can prove that you are a responsible pet owner since this apartment is first floor and you may go directly from your apartment to the fenced in back yard or across the street is lots of open space and grass on this frontage road.
The building handyman lives on the property to help you with your day to day needs.
T
The apartment room measurements in feet are:
Kitchen 14 x 12 or 168
Living Room 14 x 22 or 308
Dining Room 8 x 10 or 80
Bathroom 5 x 9 or 45
Master Back Bedroom 12 x 15 or 180
Middle Bedroom 10 x 11 or 110
Front Bedroom 11 x 11
Entire Apartment 22 x 46 or About 1,000
Even the window coverings have been done for you with mini blinds or brand new vertical blinds on all the windows.
The rent is $1250 per a month with NO security deposit, just a one time "move in fee" of only $625 instead of the usual 2 month security deposit most owners charge.

Even better, to save your money we will honor a $50 gift certificate off of your first months rent if you simply go to our website <URL> and click on “$50 Gift” on the left menu, print out your free certificate and bring it with you when you pay your 1st month rent.
No strings attached, just our way of giving you a little house warming gift.

IMPORTANT: There is a $40 charge for a credit/eviction check, you need a 600 minimum credit score with no evictions and some sort of verified rental history to qualify to be considered for this apartment.
No exceptions please.
Lots of pictures and a live video tour at <URL>.
Please dial 773-373-7368 for more details.
Everybody is welcome in our apartments.

This apartment is located in the Chicago neighborhood of McKinley Park that is home to many families and has a large residential area, populated primarily by flats, some newer townhouses, but also showcasing the occasional century-old home.
Community pride has kept even the oldest properties in good condition and pleasing to the eye.

This apartment is close to and we also service other Chicago neighborhoods, South Loop Gage Park Albany Park Andersonville Archer Heights Austin Avondale Back of the Yards Belmont Cragin Beverly Bowmanville Bridgeport Bronzeville Bucktown Buena Park Burbank Edgewater Englewood Gage Park Garfield Park Glendale Heights Gold Coast Greater Grand Crossing Humboldt Park Hyde Park Irving Park Jefferson Park Kenwood Lakeview Wrigley Lincoln Park Lincoln Square Logan Square Margate Park Marquette Park Mayfair McKinley Park Near North New City North Center North Park Area Northwest Old Town Conservatory Park Palmer Square Pilsen Ravenswood Manor River North River West Rogers Park Roscoe Village Roselle Sauganash Six Corners South Chicago South Loop South Shore St. Bens Streeterville Tri-Taylor Ukrainian Village United Center Park Uptown Washington Park West Loop West Pullman West Ridge West Rogers Park Wicker Park City of Chicago Suburbs: Algonquin Arlington Heights Barrington Berwyn Brighton Park Brook dale Chatham Chicago…..
